sentences.en: "You've never seen the Marilyn Monroe film?" — "No, I think it was a bit before my time."
sentences.cn: “你从来没看过玛丽莲·梦露演的电影？”——“是的，她拍电影时我还不记事呢。”

sentences.en: [ Mike Narrating ] Worm and I fall into our old rhythm like Clyde Frazier and Pearl Monroe.
sentences.cn: [ 迈克叙述 ] 虫子和我配合得象以前一样默契我们两好象是克莱德.弗瑞泽和佩尔. 门罗.

sentences.en: As a model, Marilyn Monroe always aspired to any acting career.
sentences.cn: 马丽琳·门罗当模特时就总是渴望在表演上干一番事业.

sentences.en: As a model, Monroe always aspired to an acting career.
sentences.cn: 当模特儿时, 梦露渴望演员生涯.

sentences.en: Bullet wound: Before becoming elected president, James Monroe dropped out of college and enlisted as a cadet in the Third Virginia Infantry in 1776.
sentences.cn: 枪伤 ：在被推选为总统之前，1776年，詹姆斯·门罗辍学参军，在第三维吉尼亚步兵团当了一名军校学员。

sentences.en: Calendars of famous people, like Elvis Presley or Marilyn Monroe.
sentences.cn: 还有些日历上印有名人, 如猫王和玛丽莲梦露.

sentences.en: Friends and admirers crammed the chapel at the small Los Angeles cemetery where Monroe is buried.
sentences.cn: 朋友和仰慕者们挤进安葬梦露的洛杉矶小公墓的教堂里。

sentences.en: Hurstwood wrote her one morning, asking her to meet him in Jefferson Park, Monroe Street.
sentences.cn: 一天早上赫斯渥写信给她, 约她在门罗街的杰佛逊公园见面.

sentences.en: I'm not in the least bit touched by the Marilyn Monroe kind of beauty.
sentences.cn: 我对玛丽莲·梦露那种美一点儿都不动心。

sentences.en: Marilyn Monroe had lots of oomph.
Marilyn Monroe is the most famous of all American movie queens , ie leading film actresses.
sentences.cn: 玛丽莲.梦露是全美最着名的影后.

sentences.en: Monroe described the financial aspect as crucial.
sentences.cn: 门罗认为金融方面至关重要。
门罗接替麦迪逊当上总统。

sentences.en: Monroe was on the phone, raging about her mistreatment by the brothers.
sentences.cn: 门罗正在打电话，怒不可遏地说着她被这几个兄弟虐待的事。

sentences.en: On the back of the photo is written the simple caption, "Mrs. Monroe".
sentences.cn: 照片背面只有简单的几个字——“梦露女士”。

sentences.en: The present crop of books and documentaries about Marilyn Monroe exploit the thirtieth anniversary of her death.
sentences.cn: 时下出现的这些有关玛丽莲·梦露的书和纪录片是借她逝世30周年之际推出的。

sentences.en: Warhol's silk screen of Marilyn Monroe
sentences.cn: 沃霍尔所作的玛丽莲∙梦露丝网印刷画

sentences.en: When woven together, as they would be in policies ranging from the Monroe Doctrine to the Marshall Plan, they were the warp and woof of a sturdy foreign policy.
sentences.cn: 当它们可以和谐地在一起运作的时候，不管是从门罗主义到马歇尔计划也好，它们都是国际事务处理的参考基础。

phrases.tran_cn: 门罗主义；类似门罗主义的策略
